mapper.sql: d.templatedetails_id AS temdetailsId, d.templatedetails_keyword AS keyword, d.templatedetails_value AS keywordToValue, d.createtime AS createtime, d.templatedetails_status AS temdetailsstatus, d.show_order AS showOrder,
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_temdetails d LEFT JOIN tem_temdetails t ON d.templatedetails_id = t.templatedetails_id LEFT JOIN sys_template st ON st.template_id = t.template_id
LEFT JOIN user_template ut ON ut.template_id = t.template_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ut.user_id = u.user_id
WHERE st.template_status = 1 AND u.user_name = #{username} AND d.templatedetails_keyword = #{keyword} AND d.show_order != 0
mapper.insert:
